name: Missile Defence
description:
My take on a classic game involving enemies and missiles. Programming skills demonstrated in this game

  • Counting level timer - UI and boolean
  • Coroutines
  • Difficulty modifier
  • Position Randomisation
  • Instantiation
  • Arrays
  • Lists
  • Return type methods
  • Button inputs
  • Audio array
  • Physics using rigidbody2D
  • Collision detection
